author: Wayne Collins
method: Pour the vermouth and vodka into a mixing glass and fill with ice cubes. Stir well and then strain into a small Martini glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.
ingredients: 15ml/Â½fl oz vermouth,  60ml/2fl oz Tyrrells potato vodka, or other potato vodka,  twist lemon peel, to garnish
